profile.name: Xabier
profile.title: Science Teacher
profile.description:
I graduated in Veterinary Medicine in February 2012. In July of the same year I obtained my first job as animal caregiver in a successful biotech company in O Porriño. It was an undergraduate work, but it was the best opportunity I had to get to know the company and also for the company to know me. In March 2014, I was promoted to Veterinary Technician, responsible for the bioteriums in which I worked, and this was my job until November 2018. During those years I also participated in the publication of a scientific article with the University of Vigo and I studied the Master of Secondary Education. Once I got my master´s degree, in a matter of weeks I got a job as a full-time science teacher at Kings College Guildford, from December 2018 to July 2019.

I am a committed, active and pro-active worker, constantly seeking for improvement and learning. In addition to my professional experiences, I would highlight my university files, participation in a research article with the University of Vigo, participation in a project to recover a species of psitacide in Isla Margarita (Venezuela) and a high level of English (C2).

challenges.description: Teacher of elementary education at Gándara International School. The basis of our pedagogy is active and experiential learning, with a solid Montessori foundation and open to other methodologies.
